If you think you have already made your point clear without the template, or your problem cannot be covered by it, you may re-open this issue again.

如果您愿意，可以请使用 issue 模板重新创建 issue。

如果你认为虽然没有使用模板，但你已经提供了复现问题的充分描述，或者你的问题无法使用模板表达，也可以重新 open 这个 issue。

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵

Is your problem the same as #11480?
不能的

> 从截图来看你竖屏时候的分辨率太高了，对于 canvas 来说内存占用跟分辨率是正比的

是分辨率太高了，调整以后就好了，谢谢

As I pointed out in the first post, I did try duplicating the entire series. So, yeah, that would certainly work. And I guess it might be doable in case of a small chart, but does have a negative performance impact on rendering larger data sets. 

I would personally argue that this is a suboptimal solution/workaround.
same issue fixed并不会固定位置，节点删减和位置移动都会影响其他节点的位置（感觉有斥力存在），文档上也没描述清楚坐标原点、默认坐标系等信息

> @colbertchai 谢谢你的回复，我已经采用其他的方式解决了

请问是怎么解决的呀，我也遇到了这个问题

Hi there !

I have a created a jsfiddle using the code provided by @mbury (updated the echarts library to use 4.4.0 because the bug changed) ,

https://jsfiddle.net/0kqyjgw9/1/

Please note that this is a bug that occurs on the drag of the zoom slider after chart **setOption** is called.

On the first time that you drag the zoom slider you see the labels stuck showing only the start and end of the range. (see the labels of the zoom slider on the next 3 screenshots they are all stuck at 10-04 1997 and 06-29 2000)
![Screenshot from 2019-11-12 12-24-28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/890368/68663606-ab1f6600-0547-11ea-95fe-0efcda0d0834.png)
![Screenshot from 2019-11-12 12-24-34](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/890368/68663612-ae1a5680-0547-11ea-89a8-550763f5c794.png)
![Screenshot from 2019-11-12 12-24-39](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/890368/68663622-b07cb080-0547-11ea-87dd-28ca31197030.png)

On the second and rest of the times you can see the correct labels (which is the current slider range).
(see the labels of the zoom slider on the next 3 screenshots that are changing correctly)
![Screenshot from 2019-11-12 12-29-37](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/890368/68664036-55978900-0548-11ea-98d4-7f7262bb6fd4.png)
![Screenshot from 2019-11-12 12-29-41](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/890368/68664043-58927980-0548-11ea-848f-360fe7d07352.png)
![Screenshot from 2019-11-12 12-29-46](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/890368/68664047-5af4d380-0548-11ea-9c45-1866e5133d3b.png)

This is a very important thing to be fixed for us. Because we have an ajax callback that sets the chart options and thus every time the labels on the zoom slider are not shown.

Thank you for your time,

Sergios.
可以使用markPont，背景设为透明，文字颜色设为黑色
Yes,but  expected is all labels should be visible if someone is downloading and using it.
需要跟你一样的效果，就算用appendData 只只能增加点，不能增加彗星的线，而且一样的有闪烁效果。。请问你或者是用其他的可视化方案解决的吗? @chaserstrong

可以使用markline模仿
源地址:http://www.tdon.site/post/26

@pissang I think `numCalculate` has no logical problem, only the parameter. When the chart is stacked, it returns max or min of the stacked data, and then using `indicesOfNearest` to get data index. So just set dimension to target dimension will fix this.
我也遇到了这个问题，一样是macOS系统，但是朋友的windows好像没这个问题

I agree this feature would be very useful. I've tried using grid.containLabel along with various other properties mentioned above, but it leads to a lot of manual calculations to account for the overlap and I can't always predict the data range a particular chart will need to display. Here is an example where the axis label notation (thousands, millions, trillions, etc.) and format can be customized by dashboard users, which means axisLabels have a wide range of potential widths:

![axis-name_manual-nameGap](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9369625/68701644-35ba9200-0555-11ea-8d68-ca766ba44e3c.png)

> 
> 请问是怎么解决的呀，我也遇到了这个问题

我分等级查询了，并没有按照原来的思路。每次查询时只有一个等级，滚轮滑动也只是显示当前查询的数据。
![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16277126/68721651-0441d500-05ee-11ea-8c94-3bb9424863c9.png)

### 解决方案

1.
``` 
      var model  = myChart.getModel().getSeriesByIndex(seriesIndex);
```

2. 
```
    var info  = model.getData();
```

然后在返回的信息里，_itemLayouts 就是返回的坐标位置， 如果想得到像素点，可以使用[convertToPixel](https://www.echartsjs.com/zh/api.html#echartsInstance.convertToPixel)

no, different problems.

Sorry, I didn't clearly describe the problem. As your example, the value of the parameter `name` will not change. I hope that the contents of the hover box can change as the mouse position changes.

My trouble is that the theme river map is a single axis, and the parameter param of the `formatter` function can only dynamically get the value of the axis (date).

In other words, the parameter value of the function `formatter` can only change with the lateral movement of the mouse, and does not change with the vertical movement of the mouse.

![深度截图_选择区域_20191113221129](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20765689/68771931-e8791600-0663-11ea-9146-99a406af73b9.png)

I hope that the content of the floating window in the image can be the data of `SS` at all times, not the data of all rivers in `11-04-2015`. 

And with the vertical movement of the mouse, the contents of the floating box will display the data of the rivers such as `DQ`, `TY`. The content of the current hover box can only change with the date.

This may seem a bit difficult and should be. I just want to make a suggestion and communicate at any time.

@deqingli

https://www.echartsjs.com/en/option.html#series-pie.emphasis.label.formatter
You can use `\n` to break line.

你是想找这个世界地图文件的意思么
https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/map/js/world.js

> 你是想知道根据 smooth 插值后的 y？这个不支持的。
> 根据自己的 data 数组从 x 计算出 y，然后再传到 convert

我同意Ovilia 的说法，这个功能不应该由Echart 去承担，可能用的人并不多，反倒增加了复杂度。你可以在hover事件的handler 里面拿到 x，自己根据data 里面的数据，构建线性函数，去推算当时的y，然后标注到图表上。

这个特定的需求可以自己实现下
Why? Download result should be the same as rendering.
Set the second series to be `show: false`
@wjdnlg 我的意见和 @alex2wong 一致
@xdlee 请提供一个复现的例子

The value of [series-graph.emphasis.lineStyle.type](https://www.echartsjs.com/zh/option.html#series-graph.emphasis.lineStyle.type) is default to `solid`, if you want `dashed`, you can change the emphasis line type of related edge.
This is the strategy we use, I want to know why you need to add such an edge with no connection in your scene.
这个bug还没解决吗，这个可是直接影响移动端要不要用echarts阿
Please provide more detailed message for us to debug, for example, a picture or a demo in echarts [gallery](https://gallery.echartsjs.com/explore.html#sort=rank~timeframe=all~author=all).

We want to offer a flow chart that an overview how many of our users moved between the different stages and buckets over time:

![expected](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/568682/68852007-4bf05b80-06d7-11ea-9b0f-f18b10120181.png)

Because only a few user "move" the current implementation skews the picture towards a heavy movement of users:

![actual](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/568682/68852016-53176980-06d7-11ea-97bb-a864a1564c93.png)

After looking into the code; I would rephrase the issue as _we need a way to define the size of a node_, implementing this with "nodes without a connection" is not the way to achieve this. Maybe an optional new property `size` on the nodes' properties would be a cleaner way to do this:

```json
{
  "nodes": [
    {
      "name": "a1",
      "size": 100
    }
...
```

To get the node's size in the chart could then be determined by whatever is bigger: the sum of incoming and outgoing edges or the node's defined size. 

https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/fcfa95012ca561becab607b065a62b5f87220801/src/chart/sankey/sankeyLayout.js#L86

The strategy I used in the demo:

+ If the `edges` is an odd number, the curveness of the line starts from 0 and the step is 0.2, for example `[0, 0.2, -0.2, 0.4, -0.4, 0.6, -0.6]`, start from 0 in order to make the line in the center is a straight line.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13548221/68947051-733a4c00-07ef-11ea-842e-a8a5990477c4.png)
 
+ If the `edges` is an even number, the curveness of the line starts from 0.1 and the step is 0.2, for example `[0.1, -0.1, 0.3, -0.3, 0.5, -0.5]`, starts from 0.1 and -0.1 in order to keep the gap of the center is also 0.2, see the following picture, see the following picture:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13548221/68946751-b3e59580-07ee-11ea-843f-0c0c6d86451a.png)

+ If there are only two edges, the curveness of the line is `[0.17, -0.17]`, only want to make the step much bigger.

I think we should provide a way for user to set the `step`  of the curveness. @100pah @pissang  do you have any idea about how to set the configuration items？
